description: Engineering services for transportation projects in BC and Yukon, includes design and planning for highways, bridges and other infrastructure
full_summary:
===========================================================

### Tender Title

* EZ899-231789 - Highway and Bridge Engineering Services Standing Offer
* EZ899-231789 - Offre à commandes pour les Services d’ingénieurs des  routes et des ponts

### Tender Reference

* Reference Number: WS3973364722
* Document Number: 3973433452
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: WS3973364722

### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

### Tender Notice

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites consulting firms with expertise in civil engineering, structural engineering, electrical engineering, transportation, geotechnical, landscaping, environmental, and archaeological services to submit offers for Standing Offers. The selected consultants will provide a range of services for transportation-related projects in British Columbia and Yukon on federally controlled properties. 

### Required Services

* Civil engineering
* Highway engineering
* Professional engineering services

### Regions of Operation

* British Columbia
* Whitehorse
* Canada

### Regions of Delivery

* British Columbia
* Whitehorse
* Canada

### End User Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contract Details

* Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
* Contract End Date: July 31, 2026
* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: April 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Date: June 6, 2023

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Janie Leung
* Contact Email: [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Country: Canada

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) 

The above rewritten version highlights the key information of the tender announcement and presents it in a clear, concise, and professional format as per your instructions. It addresses the required services, regions of operation and delivery, end-user entity, contract details, and important dates. The attached Excel file can be referenced for any additional questions or clarification.
